title: Offer Presentation for Crowdfunding
authors: Alon Hillel-Tuch, Brian Meece, Vladimir Vukicevic
venue: USPTO Patent Application 20140040157 路 Filed 2014 路 RocketHub Inc.
abstract: Patent covering innovative crowdfunding platform architecture, including secure payment processing, project validation mechanisms, offer presentation systems, and community engagement systems for creative and entrepreneurial ventures.
cited_by: Square (15+ patents on merchant financing), Capital One (social discovery), 3M (internal crowdfunding), Winklevoss/Gemini (20+ crypto patents), Givling, Angelsoft, and numerous fintech innovations

title: Beneficiary Crowdsourcing
venue: USPTO Patent Application 20140279645A1 路 Filed 2013 路 RocketHub Inc.
abstract: Patent describing systems and methods for equity crowdfunding platforms that ensure regulatory compliance with SEC, FINRA, and JOBS Act requirements while maintaining user experience and market efficiency. Includes beneficiary-focused crowdsourcing mechanisms.
cited_by: Shanghai Baichou Financial (secondary crowdfunding markets), Heyue Group (fintech platforms), BitPagos/Ripio (crypto payments), and compliance-focused crowdfunding systems
